properties.NAME: Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History
properties.ADDRESS: 10th St. & Constitution Ave. NW, Washington, DC 20560
properties.DESCRIPTION: The world's most visited natural history museum featuring dinosaur exhibits, gems, and cultural artifacts.

properties.NAME: National Museum of African American History and Culture
properties.DESCRIPTION: The only national museum devoted exclusively to African American history and culture.

properties.NAME: National Museum of American History
properties.DESCRIPTION: Explores American history through exhibitions on science, technology, culture, and the arts.

properties.NAME: National Museum of the American Indian
properties.ADDRESS: 4th St. & Independence Ave. SW, Washington, DC 20560
properties.DESCRIPTION: Dedicated to the life, languages, literature, history, and arts of Native Americans.

properties.NAME: Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum
properties.DESCRIPTION: Houses the largest collection of historic aircraft and spacecraft in the world.

properties.NAME: The Phillips Collection
properties.DESCRIPTION: America's first museum of modern art featuring Impressionist and American modern art.

properties.NAME: National Museum of Women in the Arts
properties.ADDRESS: 1250 New York Ave. NW, Washington, DC 20005
properties.DESCRIPTION: The only major museum in the world solely dedicated to celebrating women's achievements in the visual arts.

properties.NAME: National Portrait Gallery
properties.ADDRESS: 8th St. & G Pl. NW, Washington, DC 20001
properties.DESCRIPTION: Features portraits of notable Americans who have shaped U.S. history and culture.
